title: Apple’s newest health-tracking features are coming to older watches
summary: Apple just announced a bunch of new health tracking features alongside its new smartwatch lineup — but you might not need to upgrade your device to get access to them. With the launch of watchOS 26 next week, Apple will bring hypertension notifications, live translation, and the new wrist flick ges…

title: Apple Watch Series 11, Watch SE 3 and Watch Ultra 3 announced
summary: Apple updated its smartwatch lineup with the introduction of Apple Watch Series 11, Watch SE 3 and Watch Ultra 3. The trio gets 5G cellular connectivity, which is a first for Apple Watch models. The Series 11 and Watch Ultra 3 also bring new health-tracking features like Hypertension awareness. Wat…
